activities: Clutch Group is redefining the way companies harness insight from their data to tackle complex legal, risk and compliance challenges. Founded in 2005, Clutch’s global team of technologists, attorneys, and consultants helps some of the world’s largest companies in the financial services, life sciences, energy/natural resources, and technology industries to efficiently manage global, highly sensitive litigation and investigations, build stronger compliance programs, and to re-engineer their in-house legal processes. By combining robust predictive analytics, deep industry and regulatory expertise, and a lean, efficient process, Clutch’s award-winning, holistic approach is designed to help General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officers make stronger, more informed legal and business decisions.
eucountries: France, Germany, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
